name: Darkest Fears
description:
This is the demo for the real demo,  bugs are expected and story might change.

You play as a someone who lost his friend to the most dreadful fate.

Join him on his journey to find his friend and save him.

Hurry up or else he'll be a sacrifice to the all mighty one.

Join the discord: https://discord.gg/2UncpR27Yj
